emplane_lin.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !     ==================================
00002 !     
00003 !     Electromagnetic fields 
00004 !     
00005 !     - plane wave with finite rise-time and Gaussian spot
00006 !  returns laser fields at particle position x,y,z
00007 !     
00008 !     
00009 !     ==================================
00010 
00011 
00012 subroutine emplane_lin(t,tpulse,sigma0,a0,w0,x,y,z,ez,by,bx,az,phipon)
00013 
00014   implicit none
00015   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00016   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration or rise-time
00017   real, intent(in) :: a0 ! quiver strength
00018   real, intent(in) :: sigma0 ! pulse width (1/e)
00019   real, intent(in) :: w0 ! laser frequency
00020   real, intent(in) :: x,y,z ! position to evaluate force; x is distance into target from surface (x_c)
00021 
00022   real, intent(out) :: phipon, ez, by, bx, az ! pond. potential and fields
00023 
00024   real :: tenv, theta_r, gamma0, sigma, atten
00025   real :: r2, pi=3.141592654, phi, chi, phase, earg
00026   real :: k0
00027 
00028   !     linear rise
00029 
00030   gamma0 = sqrt(1 + a0**2/2)  ! Sarachik & Schappert gamma
00031   
00032   k0=w0
00033   tenv = min(1.,t/tpulse)
00034 !  tenv = 1.
00035   phase = w0*t - k0*x
00036   r2 = y**2+z**2
00037 
00038 
00039   if (sigma0.gt.0) then
00040      !  pulse envelope - Gaussian, 1/e width = sigma
00041      earg = min(20.,r2/2/sigma0**2)
00042      theta_r = exp(-earg)
00043   else 
00044      !  constant amplitude
00045      theta_r = 1.
00046   endif
00047 
00048   ! reconstruct EM fields (s-pol)
00049 
00050   Az = a0*tenv*theta_r*sin(phase)
00051   Ez = -w0*a0*tenv*theta_r*cos(phase)      ! Ez = -dAz/dt
00052   By = k0*a0*tenv*theta_r*cos(phase)       ! By = -dAz/dx
00053   Bx = -y/sigma0**2*a0*tenv*theta_r*sin(phase) ! Bx = dAz/dy
00054 
00055 
00056   phipon = Az**2
00057 
00058 end subroutine emplane_lin
